verses.name: Psalms 144:11
verses.text: Rid me, and deliver me from the hand of strange children, whose mouth speaketh vanity, and their right hand is a right hand of falsehood:

verses.name: Psalms 144:12
verses.text: That our sons may be as plants grown up in their youth; that our daughters may be as corner stones, polished after the similitude of a palace:

verses.name: Psalms 144:13
verses.text: That our garners may be full, affording all manner of store: that our sheep may bring forth thousands and ten thousands in our streets:
